author: marekm3498
content: we have different chainspecs format, so for us, it is `eip4895TransitionTimestamp`

author: barnabasbusa
content: Oh thats correct.

author: marekm3498
content: and of course, we need to provide all Shanghai EIPs in the same way üòâ

author: marekm3498
content:
It might be problematic for all of us later because block value (https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/314/files) will be breaking change for EngineAPI.  GetPayloadBodiesByHash/ByRange might be delivered later. However, if we adjust all CLs & ELs to handle getPayloadV2 in blockValue format (even with empty blockValue for now on the EL side and even ignoring the block value on the CL side), we will avoid problems.

More context: https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/892088344438255616/1050347278365376533
